channel.title: Posts on Awetomate
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Awetomate

item.title: Find Deprecated Phones via SQL
item.description: As with every CUCM release, some phones will not be supported anymore. For this example, let us look at how to find a list of phones on CUCM 11.X that are deprecated in release 12.

item.title: Working With The CUCM Database
item.description: Cisco Unified Communications Manager uses an Informix database for data storage. Accessing this data directly using SQL queries to create custom reports or gather data for analysis has often come in handy.
